BR.name: Horse Vet 3D
BR.description: Examine os cavalos para determinar a natureza das doenças ou lesões. Vá até as emergências e trate os pacientes até que eles recobrarem a saúde! Diagnostique e trate os pacientes com termômetro, ultrassom, amostra de sangue, fórceps, seringa, bandagens e muito mais Aproveite emocionantes aventuras ao ar livre: Monte seu cavalo ou vá de carro até as emergências para chegar a tempo com a ajuda dos controles do giroscópio Divirta-se com uma variedade de raças enquanto acompanha, alimenta, limpa e brinca com os animais Recapture cavalos fugidos em sua área de atuação Crie lindos potrinhos ou compre e venda cavalos Expanda sua prática com diferentes instalações, como estábulos e espaços de terapia Visite a cidade vizinha, onde ficam a loja, o banco, a academia e a agência de propaganda Colete Play Coins e troque-as pela moeda do jogo Recurso de foto em 3D: Tire uma foto em 3D verdadeira de si mesmo e use-a no jogo

CA.name: Horse Vet 3D
CA.description: Experience the daily life of a veterinarian – specialized in horses! You examine the horses to determine the nature of diseases or injuries. Drive to emergencies and treat them inpatient afterwards until they are healthy again! Diagnose and treat your patients with thermometer, ultrasonics, blood sample, forceps, syringe, bandages and more Enjoy thrilling outdoor adventures: Ride out on your horse or get into your car to reach emergencies on time with the help of the gyroscope controls Have fun with a variety of breeds while longing, feeding, cleaning and playing with them Recapture escaped horses on your practice area Breed cute foals or buy and sell horses Expand your practice with different buildings like stables and therapy house Visit the nearby town with its shop, bank, academy and advertising agency Collect Play Coins and change them into ingame currency 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game

MX.name: Horse Vet 3D
MX.description: Examina a los caballos para determinar la causa de las enfermedades y las heridas. ¡Conduce hasta urgencias y cuídales con paciencia hasta que recuperen la salud! Diagnostica y cuida de tus pacientes con termómetros, equipos ultrasónicos, muestras de sangre, fórceps, jeringuillas y vendas entre muchos otros Disfruta de emocionantes aventuras al aire libre: Monta en tu caballo o en tu coche para llevarles a urgencias a tiempo con la ayuda del sensor giroscópico Diviértete con toda una variedad de razas de caballos mientras los acaricias, alimentas, limpias y juegas con ellos Vuelve a capturar a los caballos escapados en tu clínica Cría preciosos potros o compra caballos adultos Expande tu clínica con diferentes edificios como establos o centros de tratamiento Visita la ciudad cercana, además de su tienda, banco, academia y agencia de publicidad Recoge Monedas de juego e intercámbialas por dinero dentro del juego Función de fotos en 3D: Hazte una foto en 3D y utilízala en el juego

US.name: Horse Vet 3D
US.description: Experience the daily life of a veterinarian – specialized in horses! You examine the horses to determine the nature of diseases or injuries. Drive to emergencies and treat them inpatient afterwards until they are healthy again! Diagnose and treat your patients with thermometer, ultrasonics, blood sample, forceps, syringe, bandages and more Enjoy thrilling outdoor adventures: Ride out on your horse or get into your car to reach emergencies on time with the help of the gyroscope controls Have fun with a variety of breeds while longing, feeding, cleaning and playing with them Recapture escaped horses on your practice area Breed cute foals or buy and sell horses Expand your practice with different buildings like stables and therapy house Visit the nearby town with its shop, bank, academy and advertising agency Collect Play Coins and change them into ingame currency 3D photo feature: Take a real 3D photo of yourself and use it in the game
